May 18, 2013 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Fourth Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-fourth-section
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Nanette Jones, Cornet (Ebbw Valley Brass) [not Peter Thomas as reported]
May 19, 2013, 1:18 p.m. June 3, 2013, 1:15 p.m.
1 Ebbw Valley Brass Gareth Ritter Kaleidoscope [Sparke]
2 Usk Brass Band Jeff Jones Lindum Suite
3 Newport Borough Band Robin Hackett The Dark Side of the Moon
4 Vale of Glamorgan Band David Short Anglian Dances
5 Pontypool Brass Owen Farr The Land of the Long White Cloud - Aotearoa
6 Cwmtawe District Training Band Wayne Pedrick Lydian Pictures
Withdrawn Lydney Band Unknown
